descript.abstract: This shapefile shows the images available in DigitalGlobe's Image Library (Archive).
descript.purpose: This shapefile can be used to identify strips available in DigitalGlobe's ImageLibrary for a given area of interest (AOI)

idinfo.accconst: This dataset can be used within your organization without any restrictions
idinfo.useconst: Please do not modify the file as each shapefile reflects available images in our library

horizpa.horizpar: 1:50000 scale by default; Higher accuracy products available based on availability of DEM and GCP's

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Catalog ID in DG ImageLibrary
Imagery acquisition date
Minimum off nadir collection angle across image strip
Maximum off nadir collection angle across image strip
Average off nadir collection angle across image strip

Minimum sun elevation angle across image strip at the time of collection
Maximum sun elevation angle across image strip at the time of collection
Average sun elevation angle across image strip at the time of collection
Minimum angle across strip from true north that the camera was facing when the image was collected
Maximum angle across strip from true north that the camera was facing when the image was collected
Average angle across strip from true north that the camera was facing when the image was collected
Mimimum resolution of panchromatic band across strip
Maximum resolution of panchromatic band across strip
Average resolution of panchromatic band across strip

distinfo.custom: call DigitalGlobe customer service to visit our website at www.digitalglobe.com
distinfo.techpreq: Require SW that can display ESRI shapefile
